title: New TT Changes
body: About the new changes... I play a lot of TT, and I agree that some changes needed to be made, but the distance between the two tier 1 turrets in both lanes in a tad rediculous no? I mean you can't do much in lane early other than cs cause if you play aggressive you're basically tower diving. On top of that, I feel that if you play a range or an early game champ, you can easily bully someone out of lane and make them lose a ton of cs... Since the turrets right there and will kill off multiple waves before the player can get back... Allo easy snowball!
